p.n: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
p.k: 79% Third year begins, and Hogwarts is under tight security as a notorious wizard is at large. With Alan Rickman

p.n: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
p.k: 78% Harry must confront a dragon and an enchanted maze, only to find himself in the grasp of He Who Must Not Be Named. Frightening images

p.n: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
p.k: Harry forms a secret society to battle Voldemort when the Ministry of Magic refuses to believe he's alive. With the late Alan Rickman

p.n: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
p.k: 76% The gang deal with the pangs of young love, as evil Lord Voldemort plots Dumbledore's demise. With the late Alan Rickman

n.u: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part

p.n: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part 1
p.k: As Voldemort takes over the Ministry of Magic, Harry tries to destroy the horcruxes that give him power

n.u: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part

p.n: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part 2
p.k: Harry must face his nemesis Voldemort in an epic final confrontation. With the late Alan Rickman
From Harry Potter to He Who Shall Not Be Named, Alex Zane explores the secrets behind the vibrant characters of the much-loved wizarding world brought
